Package entity

Class NPC

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.LivingEntity
entity.NPC
public class NPC extends LivingEntity
The NPC class represents a non-player character (NPC) in the game. It extends the LivingEntity class and includes additional properties specific to NPCs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NPC(Point2D location, double weight, int health, int maxHealth, int armor, int maxArmor, int strength, int maxStrength, int magic, int maxMagic, Inventory inventory, String type, EntityManager entityManager, int level, int experience, SpriteManager spriteManager, NPCType npcType)
    Constructs an NPC with the specified attributes.
    NPC(Point2D location, Inventory inventory, String type, EntityManager entityManager, SpriteManager spriteManager, NPCType npcType)
    Constructs an NPC with the specified attributes, using default maximum values for health, armor, strength, and magic.
    NPC(Point2D location, String type, EntityManager entityManager, SpriteManager spriteManager, NPCType npcType)
    Constructs an NPC with the specified location, type, entity manager, sprite manager, and npcType.

      public NPC(Point2D location, double weight, int health, int maxHealth, int armor, int maxArmor, int strength, int maxStrength, int magic, int maxMagic, Inventory inventory, String type, EntityManager entityManager, int level, int experience, SpriteManager spriteManager, NPCType npcType)
      Constructs an NPC with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the NPC.
      weight - The weight of the NPC.
      health - The health of the NPC.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the NPC.
      armor - The armor of the NPC.
      maxArmor - The maximum armor of the NPC.
      strength - The strength of the NPC.
      maxStrength - The maximum strength of the NPC.
      magic - The magic of the NPC.
      maxMagic - The maximum magic of the NPC.
      inventory - The inventory of the NPC.
      type - The type of the NPC.
      entityManager - The entity manager for managing the NPC.
      level - The level of the NPC.
      experience - The experience of the NPC.
      spriteManager - The sprite manager for the NPC.
      npcType - The NPCType of the NPC.

      inventory - The inventory of the NPC.

      npcType - The NPCType of the NPC.
